duties_responsibilities.duty: Adherence to Company Core Beliefs and all safety and quality requirements.
Operating machinery used in the manufacture of products under moderate supervision.
Completing tasks and assignments and solving routine problems with some latitude for independent judgment.
Involvement in equipment set-up and/or calibration of more complex assignments.
Loading component materials into product-specific tools and/or performing finishing operations.
Reading and following operating manuals, maintenance instructions, and procedures.
Inspecting parts visually and dimensionally to assure conformance to requirements.
Following established documentation for product manufacturing.
Cleaning and maintaining machinery as necessary.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate or equivalent. Technical or vocational schooling preferred.
